Dinnerbone: In my defense, I was working on boats.
Dinnerbone: 在我的计划中，我正对船进行更改。
Searge: He's probably just porting our changes from the first snapshot we did this year ;)
Searge: 他可能只是在移植我们在今年的第一个快照中所作的更改 ;)
_tomcc: PC boats might be getting fixed, don't panic, this is not a drill I repeat this is not a drill
_tomcc: PC的船可能会修复，不要紧张，这不是演习，重要的事说两遍，这不是演习
Dinnerbone: (_tomcc) Spoilers!
Dinnerbone: (_tomcc) 剧透！
_tomcc: (Dinnerbone) Spoilers on boats? That wouldn't be too classy wouldn't it?
_tomcc: (Dinnerbone) 船的剧透？这不会很好，对吧？






6.png (14.63 KB, 下载次数: 1)

下载附件

2015-9-30 21:35 上传









7.png (14.64 KB, 下载次数: 1)

下载附件

2015-9-30 21:35 上传





Dinnerbone: May have to break the "riding" tag on entities (so custom maps with it will need to be fixed). Tried to find a way around it but can't. :(
Dinnerbone: 我可能会取消实体的“Riding”标签（所以自定义地图需要修改）。我试图找到一个方式来解决但是我做不到。 :(
Dinnerbone: Instead of /summon Pig {riding:Cow}, it'd probably be: /summon Cow {passengers:[Pig]} - also allows for multiple passengers, and nesting.
Dinnerbone: 用来替代/summon Pig {riding:Cow}，你可能需要写/summon Cow {passengers:[Pig]}——这允许多个乘客，以及嵌套。


也就是说，PC的船很有可能改成PE一样，可以乘坐两个实体了。
